name: Lux DLX 3 - Map Conquest Game
description:
Lux DLX is an epic game of strategy & conquest. Similar to the board game RISK, but better!

Features: over 100 maps, smart AI, fast UI, universal app, hotseat multi-player, and many more options!

100+ Maps include:
- Australia Mini
- Brasil Mini
- British Isles Mini
- Canada Mini
- China Mini
- Earth vs Mars
- Europe Mini
- France Mini
- Germany Mini
- Italy Mini
- Japan mini
- Rome mini
- USA mini
- 100 more for no extra charge!

HD maps designed to fit tablet screens include:
- Canada HD
- Franco-Prussian War HD
- King Arthur
- Napoleonic Wars HD
- Rome HD
- Silicon Valley HD
- Spanish Civil War HD
- Vietnam War HD
- WWII Battles series
- and more!

No hidden in-app fees, everything is included in the single purchase.

Warning: this game has serious replay value!

Version 3 adds:
- Quick-buttons for Auto-Advance and All-In-Attack modes.
- Enhanced OpenGL graphics engine.
- Supports widescreen iPhones.
- More maps!

Version 2 adds:
- Extra hard Reaper AI.
- Game menu.
- iPad full-screen support.
- Download multiple maps at once.
- Hotseat multi-player improvements.
- More maps!

Tips to Win:
- attack with 3 or more armies for best odds
- take over 1 enemy country per turn for a card
- fully eliminate an enemy and you get their cards

Try out our other game Lux Touch for free.

Lux DLX is a mobile version of Lux Delux,
available for desktops and laptops.

Wage a virtual war and conquer the world. Roll the dice, take a risk and win!

"Because taking over the world is fun!"

Lux is not associated with the board game RISK.
